headline: Could Generac’s (GNRC) Move Into Microinverters Reveal a Shift in Its Long-Term Growth Play?
summary: Earlier this month, Generac Holdings unveiled the PWRmicro, an 820W microinverter designed for residential solar applications, expanding its smart energy management offerings. This product launch underscores Generac's ongoing commitment to innovation in the home energy sector as it diversifies beyond traditional backup power solutions. We'll explore how Generac's entry into residential solar microinverters could reinforce its investment case in the evolving energy technology landscape. These...
